kb3.name: kb3_sum_pilot
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_sum_pilot` ( `psm_plt_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `psm_shp_id` int(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `psm_kill_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `psm_kill_isk` float NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `psm_loss_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `psm_loss_isk` float NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`psm_plt_id`,`psm_shp_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM;
